body:
ok, I've done all of that and I managed to get all of the windows except for 4 to attach to the proper surfaces. 



Thank you for the tips. Any ideas on what I am doing wrong with the final 4 windows. I never thought it would be this hard to get windows into the model :)



ps - thank you for showing me a cleaner way to set up the zones. It looks MUCH better.

attachments.name: Great North Rd Energy Model-24 Mar.gh
